translation.it: E io devo andare in Turchia. In Turchia?

translation.en: I need to find Hakan and the Forest Elves.
translation.it: Da Hakan e gli elfi della foresta.

translation.en: They're the ones that can build a new star for me to reignite.
translation.it: Solo loro possono costruire una nuova Stella.

translation.en: But, Nick, you've never flown with only seven reindeer.
translation.it: Nick, non hai mai volato con sette renne.

translation.en: I know, I know. And you can't work on Dasher and find a cure for Elf Bane by yourself.
translation.it: Lo so. E tu da sola non puoi curare Fulmine e gli elfi intossicati.

translation.en: Jack will help me.
He will?
Should I stay here, too?
No, no, I need you to come with me.
Why?
Well, with only seven, I'm not even sure we can get the sleigh off the ground.
translation.it: Beh, con sette renne sarà dura anche far alzare la slitta.

translation.en: I'm gonna need all the help I can get, Kate.
Hurry back.
[sighs] Work your magic, Mrs. Claus.
-On, Dasher! On, uh, Dancer! -[reins crack]
On, Comet. On, Comet!
Uh, Vixen! [shouts in Elvish]
[Kate] Santa, what about all the presents you need to deliver?
translation.it: Babbo Natale, e i regali da consegnare?

translation.en: Christmas is only three days away.
translation.it: Natale è solo fra tre giorni.

translation.en: -Without Dasher, how are we-- -Like I said, it's a challenge.
translation.it: - Senza Fulmine, saremo… - Come detto, è una sfida.

translation.en: But, you see, they're… they're improving.
As long as their Christmas Spirit stays high, we should be okay. [grunts]
translation.it: Finché il loro spirito natalizio rimane alto, dovremmo farcela.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Santa. If I hadn't have just--
translation.it: Mi dispiace tanto, Babbo Natale. Se non fossi…

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no, no, no.
This is not your fault, Katie Cat.
translation.it: Tu non hai colpe, Katie Chella.

translation.en: Believe me, that tricky little elf was gonna find his way into the village one way or another.
translation.it: Credimi, quel piccolo elfo maligno sarebbe comunque arrivato al villaggio.

translation.en: Well, what's he gonna do now?
Oh, he's probably trying to figure out some way to beat us to Turkey.
translation.it: Probabilmente sta cercando il modo di precederci in Turchia.

translation.en: -But why? -Well, to stop me from getting a new star.
translation.it: - Perché? - Per impedirmi di prendere una Stella.

translation.en: That's not gonna happen.
Because he's not taking one thing into consideration.
translation.it: Perché lui non tiene conto di una cosa.

translation.en: What's that?
He can't possibly get there as fast as we can, no matter what he does.
translation.it: Non può arrivare lì prima di noi, qualunque cosa faccia.

translation.en: You underestimate me, old man, just like you always do. [scoffs]
translation.it: Mi sottovaluti, vecchio mio. Come sempre.

translation.en: [sighs] We need to find a way to get the elves back to normal.
translation.it: Dobbiamo trovare un modo per disintossicare gli elfi.

translation.en: [sighs] Okay. Now…
Elf, elf flu…
Elf-bin…
Here it is, Elf Bane.
-Oh, dear. -What?
It only has one known cure.
-"Levande Root"? -[Mrs. Claus] It's a rare Arctic flower.
translation.it: La radice di levande? Sì, un raro fiore artico. E qui cresce solo in un posto.

translation.en: And there's only one place that it grows around here.
translation.it: Sì, un raro fiore artico. E qui cresce solo in un posto.

translation.en: Okay. Now, follow this path
through the forest, and it will lead you to the Levande Root.
translation.it: nella foresta, arriverai alla radice di levande.

translation.en: Okay, but you're coming with me, right?
translation.it: Ok, ma tu vieni con me, giusto?

translation.en: No, I need to stay here with Dasher.
translation.it: No, devo stare qui con Fulmine.

translation.en: But, Mrs. Claus, isn't it kinda dangerous out there?
translation.it: Ma, Sig.ra Natale, non è pericoloso là fuori?

translation.en: It can be, but that's true of any place.
translation.it: Sì, ma come qualsiasi altro posto.

translation.en: You can do this, Jack. I won't let anything happen to you.
translation.it: Puoi farcela, Jack. Non lascerò che ti succeda niente.

translation.en: I'll be watching you the entire time.
translation.it: Ti terrò d'occhio per tutto il tempo.

translation.en: And I'm arming you…
with these.
You're arming me with cookies?
Well, they're not just any old cookies.
translation.it: Beh, non sono dei semplici biscotti.

translation.en: Okay, the gingerbread man cookie explodes when you throw it,
translation.it: Ok, il biscotto "omino al pan di zenzero" esplode, quando lo lanci.

translation.en: and the snowman cookie gives you courage.
translation.it: E il biscotto "pupazzo di neve" ti dà coraggio.

translation.en: [sighs] Well, you have to move fast.
We don't have a moment to lose.
translation.it: Non c'è un attimo da perdere.

translation.en: Wait. Hold on.
-[Hugg shouts in Elvish] -My goodness.
You're never gonna get past those elves. [sighs]
Okay.
[in English] I just baked a whole batch of cookies!
translation.it: Ho appena sfornato un bel po' di biscotti.

translation.en: -[Hugg] Cookies? -Who's hungry?
[in English] That will distract them for about 30 seconds.
translation.it: Questo li distrarrà per circa trenta secondi.

translation.en: -Got it. -Now… there.
[exhales] Now's your chance, Jack.
[takes a deep breath] It's pretty cold out there.
What if I get frostbite?
translation.it: E se mi prendo i geloni?

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about frostbite. I'm an expert at reattaching fingers and toes.
translation.it: Tranquillo, sono un'esperta nel riattaccare le dita di mani e piedi.

translation.en: -[Jack gasps] -Now, hurry.
-[gentle orchestral music playing] -Be my hero.
My mom used to say the same thing to me. [sighs]
translation.it: Anche la mamma mi diceva così.

translation.en: Okay. It's hero time.
translation.it: Va bene. È l'ora degli eroi.

translation.en: This is not what I expected Turkey to look like at all.
translation.it: Non è proprio la Turchia che mi aspettavo.

translation.en: Ah, you're on hallowed ground here, Kate.
You're about to witness something that no one else on earth has ever seen before.
translation.it: Stai per assistere a qualcosa che nessun umano ha mai visto prima.

translation.en: -[distant rustling] -What was that?
-Uh, Santa? -What?
You've been shot.
What?
Well, don't you feel anything?
Nah, riding around in the sleigh is like a shot of novocaine in the old butt cheek sometimes. [inhales sharply]
translation.it: No, un giro sulla slitta è come un'iniezione di anestetico sulle chiappe.

translation.en: [in English, softly] Wow.
[in English] You believe this guy?
[in English] Why don't they recognize you?
Oh, they're just kids.
Look at 'em.
Can't be more than-- What? Two, three hundred years old?
They've never seen me. [chuckles]
I haven't been back here in, oh, I don't know, maybe 500 years. [chuckles]
translation.it: Non tornavo qui da… Non so, forse 500 anni.

translation.en: Five hundred and twenty-two, to be exact, Nicholas.
Hakan. [clicks tongue]
You look well and wise.
translation.it: Hai un aspetto sano e saggio.

translation.en: You as well, Nicholas. Who's your friend?
translation.it: Anche tu, Nicholas. Chi è la tua amica?

translation.en: [in English] Hmm. Your Elvish is impressive.
So is your English.
Thank you.
So, what brings you both here?
translation.it: Allora, cosa vi porta entrambi qui?

translation.en: -Belsnickel. -Oh. What's he done now?
Destroyed the Christmas Star.
translation.it: Ha distrutto la Stella di Natale.

translation.en: Well, we can build a new container.
translation.it: Beh, possiamo costruire un nuovo contenitore.

translation.en: But only you, Nicholas,
can harness the power of the Star of Bethlehem.
translation.it: puoi imbrigliare il potere della Stella di Betlemme.

translation.en: And as you know, the ritual is very dangerous.
translation.it: E, come sai, il rituale è molto pericoloso.

translation.en: [Santa] We have no other choice.
We must move quickly.
[in English] That is really high.
Okay. Which one did she say gives you courage, and which one explodes?
translation.it: Ok, qual era quello che dà coraggio, e quale quello che esplode?

translation.en: I'm gonna go with the gingerbread man.
No, no, it's the snowman…
I think.
I hope I don't blow up.
[exhales] All right, let's do this.
Thank you, Hakan.
Thank you, Santa Claus.
Now, hurry back to the North Pole.
translation.it: Ora tornate in fretta al Polo Nord.

translation.en: Christmas must endure.
Right, then, Kate. No time to lose. Hold on to this. [clears throat]
translation.it: Ok, Kate. Non c'è tempo da perdere. Reggi questa.

translation.en: -[in English] Here, kitty, kitty. -[snarls]
Would you like a treat? [grunts]
-[footsteps fading] -That's right. You better run.
There's a new sheriff in town, and his name is Jack Booker.
translation.it: C'è un nuovo sceriffo in città, e si chiama Jack Booker.

translation.en: Looks like the reindeer are doing a lot better.
You bet. Homeward bound!
[Santa] Holy jingle bells!
Ah, you really didn't think I was just gonna disappear, did you?
translation.it: Non pensavi mica che sarei sparito, vero?

translation.en: -[high-pitched yipping] -What in the world is that?
It's my new ride.
-[Belsnickel's sleigh clatters] -Doesn't exactly scream aerodynamic.
What do you call those?
-[Belsnickel] It's my team of jackalotes. -[Santa] Jack-a-what?
Jackal and coyote hybrid. My creation. Pretty cool, huh?
translation.it: Un mix tra sciacalli e coyote. Una mia creazione. Fighi, eh?

translation.en: They're a long way from cool.
But you are clever, Belsnickel. I'll give you that.
translation.it: Ma sei intelligente, Belsnickel. Te lo concedo.

translation.en: Just not clever enough to beat me. [laughs]
Wanna bet?
-[Santa grunts] -[Kate] Oh, no! The star!
-[Santa] Hold on tight! -[device whirring]
-[reindeer grunt] -[Santa] Come on, girls!
[Kate] Why did we stop? -What's going on? -I don't know.
There's something wrong with my instruments.
-[meter whirring] -[Santa] I gotta do something, fast.
We need to get that star back from Belsnickel!
translation.it: Dobbiamo riprenderci la Stella da Belsnick…

translation.en: Whoo-hoo! You feel that, everybody?
That's a world without Santa Claus.
translation.it: Ecco il mondo senza Babbo Natale.

translation.en: -[sips] -That's my good girl. Drink it up.
-[Dasher panting] -Drink it up.
-Good girl. -[Dasher moans softly]
-[door slams] -[Jack] I made it!
-Never doubted you for a moment. -That makes one of us.
translation.it: Non ho mai avuto dubbi. Eri la sola.

translation.en: You think this'll work?
[inhales sharply] If it doesn't, we lose the elves forever. Let's go.
translation.it: Lo spero, o perderemo gli elfi per sempre. Vieni!

translation.en: -[wind whipping] -Where are we?
You mean, "When are we?" Look!
I think, somehow, we've gone back in time.
translation.it: In qualche modo siamo tornati indietro nel tempo.

translation.en: Back in time?
Wait a minute, Boston.
Logan International Airport, Christmas Eve.
It's not good. Why not?
Well, during the holidays,
airports have some of the lowest Christmas Spirit in the world.
translation.it: negli aeroporti c'è pochissimo spirito natalizio.

translation.en: Right now, this one's at…
…7% and dropping.
Well, what happens if Christmas Spirit gets down to zero?
translation.it: E che succede se arriva a zero?

translation.en: The reindeer won't be able to fly at all. Now, look at them. They're exhausted.
translation.it: Le renne non potranno volare, per niente. Guardale. Sono esauste.

translation.en: All right. Hold on tight. Okay, I'm gonna have to bring her down.
translation.it: Ok, reggiti forte. Devo portarle giù. Sarà una manovra un po' brusca.

translation.en: Now, this… this might get a little rough.
translation.it: Devo portarle giù. Sarà una manovra un po' brusca.

translation.en: -Are they gonna be okay? -This is worse than I thought.
translation.it: - Se la caveranno? - È peggio di quanto pensassi.

translation.en: -[Santa] Oh, no. -What?
We just opened a tear in the fabric of time.
translation.it: Abbiamo creato una fessura nello spazio-tempo.

translation.en: -Those wormholes won't stay open for long. -How much time do we have?
translation.it: Quei wormhole si chiuderanno presto. Quanto abbiamo?

translation.en: Uh, 11, 12 minutes, at the most.
Which means if we don't get Christmas Spirit up soon…
translation.it: Se lo spirito natalizio non risale presto…

translation.en: We're stuck here forever.
Bingo! There's the guilty culprit, right here.
translation.it: Bingo! Ecco la causa di tutto.

translation.en: -What is it? -Ah, some kind of time twister.
Looks like Belsnickel figured out a rudimentary form of time travel.
translation.it: Belsnickel ha scoperto una grezza forma di viaggio nel tempo.

translation.en: -[chuckles] You gotta admire his work. -[buzzes]
But, as usual, it's also got his signature shoddy craftsmanship.
translation.it: Ma, come sempre, la sua arte presenta grossi difetti.

translation.en: [sighs] And looks like it's out of juice.
You need to find a power source for that.
translation.it: Tu trova il modo di ricaricarlo.

translation.en: I need to get Christmas Spirit up and running again.
translation.it: Io devo risollevare lo spirito natalizio.

translation.en: [woman on PA] Attention, all passengers, TWA flight zero-seven
-Now, that's good, that's good. -[man on PA] Oh.
I think I found out what this thing runs on.
Triple-A batteries.
Only Belsnickel could power a time machine with triple-As.
translation.it: Solo Belsnickel poteva pensare a una macchina del tempo a pile.

translation.en: All right, let's see what I've got here.
[clears throat, sighs] Yeah. There we go.
-These are expired. -What?
[sighs] That's all I've got.
-The gift shop. They'll have some there. -Yeah. Good thinking. All right.
translation.it: Il negozio di souvenir! Sì. Ottima idea. D'accordo. Valle a comprare e poi torna qui, ok?

translation.en: You go get 'em and then meet me right back here. All right?
translation.it: Sì. Ottima idea. D'accordo. Valle a comprare e poi torna qui, ok?

translation.en: [sighs] All right. Let's see what we have to play with here.
translation.it: Ok, vediamo con chi abbiamo a che fare, qui.

translation.en: -[register whirring] -Three dollars, please.
Here you go. Keep the change.
-Is this some kind of joke? -[Kate] Hmm?
Is this Monopolymoney?
No, that's real.
[scoffs] This is the worst counterfeit job I've ever seen.
translation.it: È il peggior falso che abbia mai visto.

translation.en: -It says 2020. -Oh.
I bet they won't even be using paper money in 30 years.
translation.it: Tra 30 anni non useranno neanche più il contante.

translation.en: -Um, right. Um, my mistake. Sorry. -Hey, you gotta pay for those batteries.
translation.it: Giusto. Mi sono sbagliata, scusi. Ehi, devi pagare le pile.

translation.en: What's goin' on here, young lady?
Where are your parents?
Oh, they're… they're cool with me traveling alone.
translation.it: Sono… Mi fanno viaggiare da sola.

translation.en: Hmm. Can I see your boarding pass, please?
You know what? I must have dropped it over there. Uh, I'll go get it.
translation.it: Sa una cosa? Dev'essermi caduto laggiù. Vado a prenderlo.

translation.en: You know what? Hey! Why don't you come with me?
translation.it: Ehi! Perché non vieni con me?

translation.en: -What? No, please. -Look, kid, you got no ticket, no parents.
translation.it: - Cosa? No! - Ragazzina… Sei sola e senza biglietto.

translation.en: -For all I know, you could be a runaway. -But I'm not a… Not exactly.
translation.it: - Magari sei scappata di casa. - Ma non sono… non proprio.

translation.en: You know what? Just page Santa Claus. You'll see.
translation.it: Senta, scriva a Babbo Natale e vedrà.

translation.en: Page Santa Claus. -Yeah, I'll get right on that. -[scoffs]
translation.it: A Babbo Natale. Certo, lo farò dopo.

translation.en: -Okay. -[chimes jingle]
[gate agent] I'm sorry, everyone. I don't have good news.
translation.it: Scusate, ma non ho buone notizie.

translation.en: All flights have been canceled!
translation.it: Tutti i voli sono stati cancellati!

translation.en: What? Five minutes ago, you said there'd be a 30-minute delay.
translation.it: Che? Poco fa ha detto che c'era solo mezz'ora di ritardo.

translation.en: And now that flight has been canceled.
translation.it: E ora quel volo è stato cancellato.

translation.en: So you're telling me you didn't know five minutes ago that it was a cancellation and not a delay?
translation.it: Mi vuole dire che cinque minuti fa non sapeva che l'avrebbero cancellato?

translation.en: I am telling you.
Listen, we can offer you a complimentary hotel room for the night.
translation.it: Senta, possiamo offrirle una notte omaggio in albergo.

translation.en: I don't want a free hotel room!
I want a flight to Chicago, right now!
translation.it: Voglio un volo per Chicago! Adesso!

translation.en: -Time to go to work. -[chimes jingle]
♪ Now, wait a minute ♪
-[choir vocalizes] -Now, listen, brothers and sisters.
We ain't going nowhere
translation.it: Non si va da nessuna parte

translation.en: with all this negativity.
All this fussin' and fightin'
ain't nothing but stupidity.
I've been listening to this noise and nonsense
all night and day.
Now, let's hear what the man with the plan has to say.
translation.it: Ora, sentiamo cos'ha da dire L'uomo che ha un piano

translation.en: Go on, honey.
Tell them what it is we need.
Well, what we need is, uh…
translation.it: Beh, quello che ci serve è…

translation.en: Well, it's real simple.
All we need is, uh…
…the spirit of Christmas!
Perhaps I should explain a little further.
-[band playing] -♪ Well, you can look through any window ♪
♪ You see a great big beautiful world ♪
translation.it: Vedrai un mondo grande e bellissimo

translation.en: ♪ There's an exciting adventure ♪
♪ Waiting for every boy and girl ♪
♪ But, Santa, life can be frustratin' ♪
translation.it: Ma, Babbo Natale! La vita può essere frustrante

translation.en: ♪ And very confusin' too ♪
♪ That's why When you see a bad mood comin' ♪
translation.it: Ecco perché quando prevedi Una cattiva mossa

translation.en: ♪ You gotta catch it Right from the start ♪
♪ That's when you gotta stop thinkin' ♪
translation.it: È allora che devi smettere di pensare

translation.en: -♪ And learn to trust your heart ♪ -[mouthing]
translation.it: E imparare a fidarti del tuo cuore

translation.en: ♪ You need the spirit of Christmas ♪ [laughs]
translation.it: Ti serve lo Spirito di Natale

translation.en: ♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
-♪ Tell it, Santa! ♪ -♪ Yeah, the spirit of Christmas ♪
translation.it: - Dillo, Babbo Natale! - Lo Spirito di Natale

translation.en: -♪ Never goes away ♪ -[choir] ♪ Never goes away ♪
[both] ♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
-♪ Spirit of Christmas ♪ -♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
-♪ Spirit of Christmas ♪ -[both] ♪ The spirit of Christmas ♪
♪ Gonna save the day ♪
♪ Gonna save the day, sax! ♪
[chuckles softly] Hey, Grinch.
Don't look so down in the dumps. Christmas is tomorrow, after all.
translation.it: Non essere così triste. Dopotutto domani è Natale.

translation.en: I wouldn't be so sure of that.
Sometimes, I just don't get people.
translation.it: A volte non capisco la gente.

translation.en: A little snag in their plans, and suddenly, the sky is falling.
translation.it: Un piccolo intoppo, e pare che caschi il mondo.

translation.en: Santa will find a way to make it all work out. He always does.
translation.it: Babbo Natale risolverà tutto. Come sempre.

translation.en: For good little boys and girls.
I'm starting to wonder if I fall into the other category.
translation.it: Mi chiedo se io non appartenga all'altra categoria.

translation.en: [boy] Not a chance.
I know another True Believer when I see one.
Wait, you know about True Believers?
translation.it: Aspetta, sai cosa sono i veri credenti?

translation.en: I come from a long line of them.
That's why I know that, by this time tomorrow, I'm gonna be in Miami.
translation.it: Ecco perché so che domani, a quest'ora, sarò a Miami.

translation.en: Nothing better than spending Christmas on the beach, if you ask me.
translation.it: Niente di meglio che il Natale in spiaggia.

translation.en: Sounds like you'd get along with the rest of my family.
translation.it: Andresti d'accordo con la mia famiglia.

translation.en: Christmas in the tropics just isn't for me. [sighs]
translation.it: Il Natale al caldo non fa per me.

translation.en: Oh, don't get me wrong.
I love drinking hot cocoa by the fire, ice skating, all that good stuff.
translation.it: Adoro la cioccolata calda accanto al camino, pattinare e tutto il resto.

translation.en: But my grandparents live in Florida, and they're too old to travel.
translation.it: Ma i miei nonni vivono in Florida e non possono viaggiare.

translation.en: And who knows how many more Christmases I'm gonna spend with them, you know?
translation.it: Chissà quanti altri Natali mi restano con loro. Capisci?

translation.en: That's really sweet of you.
It's like my mom always says,
"Christmas isn't about where you are but who you're with."
translation.it: "Non importa dove passi il Natale, ma con chi lo passi".

translation.en: -What's wrong? -Nothing. It's just…
translation.it: Che c'è? Niente. È solo che…

translation.en: [scoffs] I'm such a bad person.
Hey, it's okay. You couldn't have done anything that bad.
translation.it: Ehi, va tutto bene. Cos'avrai mai combinato?

translation.en: Oh, I ran away and probably broke up my mom's engagement.
translation.it: Sono scappata e forse ho rovinato il fidanzamento di mia madre.

translation.en: Okay, that's bad. [chuckles slightly]
But this guy your mom's with, he must be pretty horrible.
translation.it: Ma questo fidanzato dev'essere proprio orribile.

translation.en: No, Bob's a really great guy. And he makes her so happy.
translation.it: No, Bob è un brav'uomo. La rende così felice.

translation.en: Okay. So now I'm really confused.
It's just, it's only been a couple years since my… my dad…
translation.it: È che sono passati solo un paio d'anni da quando mio padre…

translation.en: And, well, if my mom marries Bob, then it means…
translation.it: E… beh, se mamma sposerà Bob, forse…

translation.en: Your dad is really gone.
Yeah. Even though he's not here anymore,
translation.it: Sì. Anche se non è più qui, è come se fosse ancora con noi, sai?

translation.en: it still feels like he's with us, you know?
translation.it: Anche se non è più qui, è come se fosse ancora con noi, sai?

translation.en: And… I just really wanted to say goodbye to him.
translation.it: E… io volevo solo dirgli addio.

translation.en: And I guess I felt so sad about it,
I wanted everyone else to feel the same way I did.
translation.it: e volevo che gli altri si sentissero come me.

translation.en: But the truth is, now,
translation.it: Ma la verità è che ora

translation.en: I'd do anything to spend Christmas with them.
translation.it: darei tutto per stare con loro a Natale.

translation.en: Mom, Teddy, and, yeah, even Bob.
translation.it: Mamma, Teddy e… sì, persino Bob.

translation.en: Well, we'll just have to make that happen, won't we?
-[Kate] How's it going? -Almost there.
-[Kate] Hurry up. -[boy grunts]
Come on.
-What do you two think you're doin'? -[door squeaks]
Hey! Hey! No! Come back here! Hey, wait!

-[choir, crowd] ♪ Yeah! ♪ -♪ Everybody say, "yeah" ♪

♪ Sooner or later, you'll realize ♪
♪ You've got to believe in yourself ♪
